timeline.bodyText:
Do we need total here? The lists we've implemented recently, receive the total amount from the request response.
To ensure the DEFAULT_PAGINATION has the correct format, we could type it as Pagination.
timeline.author: linuspahl
linuspahl

timeline.message:
Move DEFAULT_PAGINATION to central point

## Motivation
Prior to this change, we defined DEFAULT_PAGINATION for every
list a new.

## Description
This change will define DEFAULT_PAGINATION on a central point for
pagination.

## Also
Fix use of this in URLUtils

timeline.bodyText: @kmerz Was about to merge the PR, but just saw this comment is no longer needed. It is a nitpick, but could you remove the comment, now where we disabled the rule and removed all similiar comments?
timeline.author: linuspahl
